# ğŸ” SearchBar Component

A professional, industry-standard search bar component for the Acutrack Design System with expandable functionality, suggestions, filters, and seamless integration with ButtonGroup.

## âœ¨ Features

- **Multiple Variants**: outline, filled, ghost, minimal
- **Size Options**: xs, sm, md, lg, xl
- **Expandable Search**: Click icon to expand/collapse
- **Search Suggestions**: Dropdown with keyboard navigation
- **Advanced Features**: Voice search, filters, character count
- **Accessibility**: Full ARIA support, keyboard navigation
- **Theme Support**: Light/dark mode with system preference
- **ButtonGroup Integration**: Seamless integration with existing components
- **TypeScript**: Full type safety with polymorphic support

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```tsx
import { SearchBar } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

// Basic usage (no search button by default)
<SearchBar
  placeholder="Search components..."
  onSearch={handleSearch}
  variant="outline"
  size="md"
/>

// With search button
<SearchBar
  placeholder="Search components..."
  onSearch={handleSearch}
  hasSearchButton={true}
  variant="outline"
  size="md"
/>
```

## ğŸ“± Expandable Search

The expandable search feature allows users to click a search icon that expands into a full search bar:

```tsx
<SearchBar
  placeholder="Click to expand..."
  onSearch={handleSearch}
  isExpandable={true}
  variant="outline"
  size="md"
  hasClearButton={true}
  hasSearchButton={false}
/>
```

## ğŸ¨ Variants

### Outline (Default)
```tsx
<SearchBar variant="outline" />
```

### Filled
```tsx
<SearchBar variant="filled" />
```

### Ghost
```tsx
<SearchBar variant="ghost" />
```

### Minimal
```tsx
<SearchBar variant="minimal" />
```

## ğŸ“ Sizes

```tsx
<SearchBar size="xs" />   {/* Extra Small */}
<SearchBar size="sm" />   {/* Small */}
<SearchBar size="md" />   {/* Medium (Default) */}
<SearchBar size="lg" />   {/* Large */}
<SearchBar size="xl" />   {/* Extra Large */}
```

## ğŸ”— ButtonGroup Integration

Seamlessly integrate with ButtonGroup for complex search interfaces:

```tsx
import { SearchBar, ButtonGroup, Button } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<div className="flex items-center gap-4">
  <SearchBar
    placeholder="Search..."
    onSearch={handleSearch}
    variant="outline"
    size="md"
    hasClearButton={true}
    hasSearchButton={false}
    className="flex-1"
  />
  <ButtonGroup>
    <Button variant="primary" size="md">Search</Button>
    <Button variant="outline" size="md">Advanced</Button>
    <Button variant="ghost" size="md">Filters</Button>
  </ButtonGroup>
</div>
```

### ExpandableSearchButton in ButtonGroup

For seamless integration, use the `ExpandableSearchButton` component:

```tsx
import { ExpandableSearchButton, ButtonGroup, Button } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<ButtonGroup>
  <Button variant="primary" size="md">Home</Button>
  <Button variant="outline" size="md">About</Button>
  <ExpandableSearchButton
    placeholder="Search..."
    onSearch={handleSearch}
    variant="outline"
    size="md"
    hasSuggestions={true}
  />
  <Button variant="ghost" size="md">Contact</Button>
</ButtonGroup>
```

**Perfect for navigation bars, toolbars, and compact interfaces!**

## ğŸš€ Advanced Features

### Search Suggestions
```tsx
<SearchBar
  placeholder="Type to see suggestions..."
  hasSuggestions={true}
  suggestions={searchResults}
  onSuggestionsRequest={handleSuggestionsRequest}
  onSuggestionSelect={handleSuggestionSelect}
  maxSuggestions={10}
  debounceDelay={300}
/>
```

### Voice Search
```tsx
<SearchBar
  hasVoiceSearch={true}
  onSearch={handleSearch}
/>
```

### Filters
```tsx
<SearchBar
  hasFilters={true}
  filters={[
    { id: 'components', label: 'Components', value: 'components', isActive: false },
    { id: 'layout', label: 'Layout', value: 'layout', isActive: false }
  ]}
  onFiltersChange={handleFiltersChange}
/>
```

### Character Count
```tsx
<SearchBar
  showCharacterCount={true}
  maxCharacters={100}
  onSearch={handleSearch}
/>
```

## ğŸ“‹ API Reference

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `placeholder` | `string` | `"Search..."` | Placeholder text for the input |
| `value` | `string` | `undefined` | Controlled value |
| `onChange` | `(query: string) => void` | `undefined` | Callback when query changes |
| `onSearch` | `(query: string) => void` | `undefined` | Callback when search is submitted |
| `onClear` | `() => void` | `undefined` | Callback when search is cleared |
| `variant` | `SearchBarVariant` | `"outline"` | Visual style variant |
| `size` | `SearchBarSize` | `"md"` | Size of the search bar |
| `isExpandable` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether search is expandable |
| `hasSuggestions` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether to show suggestions |
| `hasVoiceSearch` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether to show voice search button |
| `hasFilters` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether to show filter buttons |
| `isLoading` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether to show loading state |
| `isDisabled` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether search is disabled |

### Types

```tsx
export type SearchBarVariant = 'outline' | 'filled' | 'ghost' | 'minimal';
export type SearchBarSize = 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl';
export type SearchBarBehavior = 'expandable' | 'always-visible' | 'collapsible';

export interface SearchSuggestion {
  id: string;
  text: string;
  description?: string;
  icon?: string;
  category?: string;
  isHighlighted?: boolean;
}
```

## ğŸ”§ Customization

### Custom Styling
```tsx
<SearchBar
  className="custom-container-class"
  inputClassName="custom-input-class"
  containerClassName="custom-wrapper-class"
/>
```

### Custom Icons
```tsx
<SearchBar
  searchIcon="custom_search_icon"
  showSearchIcon={true}
/>
```

### Custom Behavior
```tsx
<SearchBar
  debounceDelay={500}
  autoFocus={true}
  hasFocusRing={false}
  hasRoundedCorners={false}
/>
```

## ğŸš¨ Error Handling

The component includes comprehensive error handling:
- **Logo loading failures**: Fallback to icon or text
- **Invalid props**: Graceful degradation
- **Accessibility**: ARIA attributes for screen readers
- **Keyboard navigation**: Full keyboard support
- **Click outside**: Proper event handling

- âœ… **Modern browsers**: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
- âœ… **Mobile**: iOS Safari, Chrome Mobile
- âœ… **Accessibility**: Screen readers, keyboard navigation
- âœ… **Touch**: Mobile-friendly interactions

## ğŸ”„ Migration from Header SearchBar

If you were using the old Header SearchBar:

```tsx
// Old (Header component)
<Header hasSearch={true} onSearch={handleSearch} />

// New (Standalone SearchBar)
<SearchBar onSearch={handleSearch} />
```
